channel.title: 517 help
channel.description:
Hi, i just have two simple questions -- 1. Well, my server only has a "set level" command, and many people find it too confusing to use, so what i would like to ask is : how do i add a ::master command? this means that you add a command that automatically sets all 99s.
2. how do i make certain commands so players can use them? for example, ::food for an inventory of shark, but make it so normal players can use it, not just admins
THANKS

item.title: 517 help
item.dc:creator: @surreality surreality
item.description:
@surreality wrote:

Hi, i just have two simple questions –

  1. Well, my server only has a “set level” command, and many people find it too confusing to use, so what i would like to ask is : how do i add a ::master command? this means that you add a command that automatically sets all 99s.

  2. how do i make certain commands so players can use them? for example, ::food for an inventory of shark, but make it so normal players can use it, not just admins

THANKS
